d:
update to 2026-02
(gallery updated every two vols)

2019-04 and after, comic aun changes to two-month period volume.
===
Major update 2026-02
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2026-02 was uploaded and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2023 to 2025), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.

===
Major update 2023-12
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2023-12 was uploaded and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2021-09 to 2023-06), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.

===
Major update 2022-07
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2022-08 was uploaded and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2020-01 to 2021-10), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.

===
Major update 2021-03
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2020-08 was uploaded and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2018-04 to 2019-12), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.

===
Major Update 2018-07
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2018-07 was released and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2016-07 to 2018-07), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.
===

===
Major Update 2017-07
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2017-07 was released and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2014-10 to 2016-06), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.
===

===
Major Update 2015-06
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2015-06 was released and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2013-01 to 2014-09), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.
===

===
Major Update 2013-06
A Bonus Booklet of Comic Aun 2013-06 was released and it contains detexted version of some old covers(2011-04 to 2012-12), I have updated the detexted versions. Torrent also need to be updated and please expunge the old torrent.
===

Source of pictures:
detexted ones: mainly from yande.re,minitokyo.
original ones: e-hentai,minitokyo

Detexted ones are usually illustrated cards with the magazines, you have to donate to this magazine to get the card, therefore not every cover page comes with a detexted copy due to the source.
I filtered most of these pictures, removing noise and dust,adjusting color curves, etc.

P.S Misaki started with this cover page working from the 2009-8 issue till current month issue.
Download the archive or click the original picture link on each page for better quality.
n: [Image Set] Cover pages of Comic Aun illustrated by Misaki Kurehito (2009-08 to 2026-02)
